testimonials.description: Discover what our satisfied clients say about our services

1.text: Exceptional service! I bought my land with full confidence thanks to the professional support of the team. All documents were verified and the process was transparent.

2.text: Very satisfied with my purchase. The platform is easy to use and I found exactly what I was looking for. Customer service is responsive and attentive.

3.text: Excellent land verification service. I was able to buy safely thanks to the rigorous checks carried out. I highly recommend this platform.

properties.special_request_title: Can't find what you're looking for?
properties.special_request_desc: Tell us your specific needs and we will find the ideal land for you.

about.hero_desc: We are the first digital platform dedicated to the purchase and sale of land in Togo. Our mission is to make access to land ownership simple, secure, and transparent.
about.mission_desc: Facilitate access to land ownership for all Togolese and investors by offering a modern, secure, and transparent platform. We are committed to providing quality service that respects legal standards and protects the interests of our clients.
about.vision_desc: Become the essential reference in the real estate sector in Togo and West Africa. We aspire to create an ecosystem where every land transaction is simple, fast, and secure, while contributing to the economic development of our country.
about.values_desc: The principles that guide our daily work
about.value1_desc: We guarantee total transparency in all our transactions and processes.
about.value2_desc: Our clients' trust is our priority. We work with integrity.
about.value3_desc: We aim for excellence in every aspect of our customer service.
about.value4_desc: Your satisfaction is our greatest reward and motivation.
about.team_desc: Passionate and experienced professionals at your service
about.cta_desc: Together, let's build the future of real estate in Togo

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.desc: Find answers to your questions quickly
faq.a1: Browse our catalog, select land, contact us for a visit and we will assist you in all administrative procedures.
faq.a2: Yes, all our lands are legally verified. We ensure that all documents are compliant and authentic.
faq.a3: Yes, we offer flexible financing plans tailored to your budget. Contact us to find out more.
faq.q4: How to declare land for sale?
faq.a4: Create an account, access your profile and use the declaration form. Our team will verify the information before publication.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: Welcome to Agnigban Gna. By accessing this site, you agree to be bound by these terms of use.
terms.section1_content: The use of our platform is reserved for legal purposes related to the consultation, purchase or sale of land in Togo.
terms.section2_content: All content present on this site is the exclusive property of Agnigban Gna.
terms.section3_content: Agnigban Gna strives to provide accurate information but cannot guarantee the absolute accuracy of advertisements published by third parties.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: The protection of your personal data is a priority for Agnigban Gna.
privacy.section1_content: We collect the information you provide to us when creating your account or contacting us.
privacy.section2_content: Your data is used to process your requests and improve your experience on our platform.
privacy.section3_content: We use cookies to analyze traffic and personalize content.

notice.title: Legal Notice
notice.section_content: In accordance with current Togolese legislation, we provide you with legal information regarding our platform.

buy_process.hero_subtitle: Follow these 6 simple steps to buy your land safely in Togo

security.title: Guaranteed security
security.desc: All our lands have verified and authentic land titles

support.title: Personalized support
support.desc: Our team guides you through every step of the purchase process

legal.title: Legal documents
legal.desc: All necessary documents are prepared and verified by our experts

buy_process.steps_subtitle: A simple and secure journey to become an owner

1.title: Land search
1.desc: Explore our land catalog and find the one that matches your needs and budget in Togo.

2.title: Land title verification
2.desc: Ensure the land title is authentic and complies with Togolese regulations.
tips: Verify the authenticity of the LT

3.title: Negotiation and agreement
3.desc: Discuss the price with the seller and reach a satisfactory agreement for both parties.

4.title: Finalization and payment
4.desc: Make payment according to agreed terms and sign all necessary documents.

5.title: Official transfer
5.desc: Register the land in your name with the competent land authorities.

6.title: Final validation
6.desc: Receive your ownership certificate and ensure all documents are in order.

cta.title: Ready to buy your land?
cta.desc: Our team of experts is here to support you at every step. Contact us today to start your project!

sell_process.hero_subtitle: Follow these 6 steps to sell your land quickly and safely

visibility.title: Maximum visibility
visibility.desc: Your ad is visible to thousands of potential buyers

security.title: Secure transactions
security.desc: We verify all documents for secure sales

speed.title: Fast selling
speed.desc: Sell your land quickly thanks to our efficient platform

sell_process.steps_title: The 6 Steps of the Selling Process
sell_process.steps_subtitle: A simple and efficient journey to sell your land at the best price

1.title: Ad preparation
1.desc: Create a catchy title and a detailed description of your land to attract potential buyers.
tips: Clear and precise title (e.g., 500mÂ² land in KÃ©guÃ©)

2.title: Document verification
2.desc: Gather and verify all legal documents necessary to prove the legality of your land.

3.title: Photos and location
3.desc: Add quality photos and accurately indicate your land's location on the map.

4.title: Price setting
4.desc: Determine a competitive price based on the local market and your land's characteristics.

5.title: Buyer management
5.desc: Respond to requests, organize visits, and negotiate with interested buyers.

6.title: Sale finalization
6.desc: Sign the sale documents, perform the property transfer, and receive your payment.

cta.title: Ready to sell your land?
cta.desc: Publish your ad now and reach thousands of potential buyers. Our team supports you throughout the process!
